00008 #include "CProfilesMenu.h"
00009 #include "common/Menu/CSelectionMenu.h"
00010 #include "sdl/CSettings.h"
00011 #include "sdl/CVideoDriver.h"
00012 #include "sdl/CTimer.h"
00013 #include <list>
00014 #include <string>
00015 
00016 CProfilesMenu::CProfilesMenu(Uint8 dlg_theme) :
00017 CBaseMenu(dlg_theme)
00018 {
00019  std::list<std::string> profile_list;
00020  profile_list.push_back("Classic mode (like DOS)");
00021  profile_list.push_back("Enhanced mode (more stuff)");
00022 
00023  mp_SubMenu = new CSelectionMenu<int>( m_selection, profile_list, m_dlg_theme );
00024 }
00025 
00026 void CProfilesMenu::processSpecific()
00027 {
00028  if(mp_SubMenu.get()) {
00029   mp_SubMenu->processCommon();
00030   mp_SubMenu->processSpecific();
00031   mp_SubMenu->postProcess();  
00032  }
00033  
00034  if( m_selection != NO_SELECTION)
00035  {
00036   if(m_selection == 1)
00037    setDefaultClassic();
00038   else if(m_selection == 2)
00039    setDefaultEnhanced();
00040   m_mustclose = true;
00041  }
00042 
00043 
00044  if(mp_SubMenu.get() && mp_SubMenu->mustClose())
00045  {
00046   mp_SubMenu = NULL;
00047   m_mustclose = true;
00048  }
00049 }
00050 
00051 /**
00052  * \brief This sets the default settings for a classic gameplay
00053  */
00054 void CProfilesMenu::setDefaultClassic()
00055 {
00056  stOption p_option[NUM_OPTIONS];
00057  CSettings Settings(p_option);
00058  Settings.loadDrvCfg();
00059  g_pVideoDriver->setSpecialFXMode(false);
00060  st_camera_bounds &CameraBounds = g_pVideoDriver->getCameraBounds();
00061  CameraBounds.left = 140;
00062  CameraBounds.up = 500;
00063  CameraBounds.right = 180;
00064  CameraBounds.down = 130;
00065  CameraBounds.speed = 5;
00066  g_pTimer->setFrameRate(DEFAULT_LPS, 30, DEFAULT_SYNC);
00067  p_option[OPT_SUPERPOGO].value = 0;
00068  p_option[OPT_ALLOWPKING].value = 0;
00069  p_option[OPT_KEYSTACK].value = 0;
00070  p_option[OPT_ANALOGJOYSTICK].value = 0;
00071  p_option[OPT_LVLREPLAYABILITY].value = 0;
00072  p_option[OPT_RISEBONUS].value = 0;
00073  p_option[OPT_IMPPOGO].value = 0;
00074  p_option[OPT_HUD].value = 0;
00075  Settings.saveDrvCfg();
00076 }
00077 
00078 /**
00079  * \brief This sets the default settings for an enhanced gameplay
00080  */
00081 void CProfilesMenu::setDefaultEnhanced()
00082 {
00083  stOption p_option[NUM_OPTIONS];
00084  CSettings Settings(p_option);
00085  Settings.loadDrvCfg();
00086  g_pVideoDriver->setSpecialFXMode(true);
00087  st_camera_bounds &CameraBounds = g_pVideoDriver->getCameraBounds();
00088  CameraBounds.left = 152;
00089  CameraBounds.up = 92;
00090  CameraBounds.right = 168;
00091  CameraBounds.down = 108;
00092  CameraBounds.speed = 20;
00093  g_pTimer->setFrameRate(DEFAULT_LPS, 60, DEFAULT_SYNC);
00094  p_option[OPT_KEYSTACK].value = 1;
00095  p_option[OPT_ANALOGJOYSTICK].value = 1;
00096  p_option[OPT_RISEBONUS].value = 1;
00097  p_option[OPT_IMPPOGO].value = 1;
00098  p_option[OPT_HUD].value = 1;
00099  Settings.saveDrvCfg();
00100 }
